section.title: TIM_BreakDeadTimeConfigTypeDef Struct Reference

para.para: TIM Break input(s) and Dead time configuration Structure definition.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: TIM Break input(s) and Dead time configuration Structure definition.

note.title: Note
note.para: 2 break inputs can be configured (BKIN and BKIN2) with configurable filter and polarity.
